original_title: Lady Godiva: Back in the Saddle
overview: Theres trouble brewing in Downtown Coventry. Mobster, Ray Carlton has a dreamcasinos! Hes got dirt on the local Mayor, Derek Osbourne and he wants his pound of flesh. In return for not flushing him down the toilet, Carlton has the Mayor greasing the way for a super casino on the site of the park where Lady Godiva actually rode!
tagline: A Comedy 1000 Years in the Making
title: Lady Godiva: Back in the Saddle
